Method.name: TestRegistration
Method.Implementation:
try{ w !, "==================================================" w !, "=== TestRegistration"
do ##class(WC.Data.Competition).%KillExtent() do ##class(WC.Data.Tournament).%KillExtent() do ##class(WC.Data.Participant).%KillExtent() do ##class(WC.Data.Person).%KillExtent() do ##class(WC.Data.Couple).%KillExtent()
#dim recorder As WC.Data.Recorder = ##class(WC.Data.Recorder).GetCurrentRecorder() do recorder.AvailableTournaments.Clear() do recorder.%Save()
set cmpSingle1 = "45907" set cmpNoPriv1 = "45599" set cmpClosed1 = "46034" set cmpNorm1 = "46734" set cmpNorm2 = "46735" set cmpNorm3 = "46460" set cmpNormSameDate1 = "45734" set cmpNormSameDate2 = "45688" set cmpNormSameDate3 = "45779"
set cmpList = $LB(cmpSingle1, cmpNoPriv1, cmpClosed1, cmpNorm1, cmpNorm2, cmpNorm3, cmpNormSameDate1, cmpNormSameDate2, cmpNormSameDate3)
for i=1:1:$LL(cmpList){ set cmp = ##class(WC.Data.Competition).SyncWDSF($LIST(cmpList, i), 1, .st) w !,"Cmp "_i_", st="_st do ##class(WC.Data.Recorder).AddAvailableTournament(recorder, cmp.Tournament)
if (cmp.%Id() '= cmpClosed1){ set cmp.CStatus = ##class(WC.Data.CompetitionStatus).GetByName("Registering") do cmp.%Save() } }
set sameDate = $ZDH("2014-10-12", 3) set cmpNormSameDate1Obj = ##class(WC.Data.Competition).%OpenId(cmpNormSameDate1) set cmpNormSameDate1Obj.StartDate = sameDate do cmpNormSameDate1Obj.%Save()
set cmpNormSameDate2Obj = ##class(WC.Data.Competition).%OpenId(cmpNormSameDate2) set cmpNormSameDate2Obj.StartDate = sameDate do cmpNormSameDate2Obj.%Save()
set cmpNormSameDate3Obj = ##class(WC.Data.Competition).%OpenId(cmpNormSameDate3) set cmpNormSameDate3Obj.StartDate = sameDate do cmpNormSameDate3Obj.%Save() //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
do recorder.AvailableTournaments.RemoveAt(##class(WC.Data.Competition).%OpenId(cmpNoPriv1).Tournament.%Id()) do recorder.%Save()
set prtCplNorm1 = $LB("10056986", "10056987") set prtCplNorm2 = $LB("10062148", "10073902") set prtCplNorm3 = $LB("10055891", "10051730") set prtCplNorm4 = $LB("10072330", "10070539") set prtCplNorm5SeniorII = $LB("10090056","10090007") set prtCplMixed1 = $LB("10056986", "10073902") set prtCplMixed2 = $LB("10062148", "10056987") set prtSingle1 = "10053855" set prtSingle2 = "10053856"
set testData = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
w !,!, "=== 1. Competition not found" set testData.competitionId = 100 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 2. Recorder no privileges" set testData.competitionId = cmpNoPriv1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 3. Competition bad status" set testData.competitionId = cmpClosed1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 4. Registration normal couple(1) into normal cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 5. Registration normal couple(2) into normal cmp(2)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm2 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm2, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm2, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 6. Again registration normal couple(1) into normal cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 7. Registration couple with 2 epmty numbers into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 8. Registration couple with 1 epmty numbers into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = prtSingle1 set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 9. Registration mixed couple(1) into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplMixed1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplMixed1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 10. Registration normal solo(1)-man into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = prtSingle1 set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 11. Registration solo with empty number into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 12. Registration solo with wrong number into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "7777777" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 13. Registration normal couple(1) into normal cmpSameDate(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 14. Registration normal couple(1) into normal cmpSameDate(2)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate2 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 15. Registration normal solo into normal cmpSameDate(3). WRONG Age Group" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate3 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm5SeniorII, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Registration(testData)
w !, "== End of test registration" w !, "==================================================" } catch(ex){ w ! do $SYSTEM.OBJ.DisplayError(ex.AsStatus()) }
q $$$OK

Method.name: TestDeregistration
Method.Implementation:
try{ w !, "==================================================" w !, "=== TestDeregistration"
set cmpSingle1 = "45907" set cmpNoPriv1 = "45599" set cmpClosed1 = "46034" set cmpNorm1 = "46734" set cmpNorm2 = "46735" set cmpNorm3 = "46460" set cmpNormSameDate1 = "45734" set cmpNormSameDate2 = "45688" set cmpNormSameDate3 = "45779"
set prtCplNorm1 = $LB("10056986", "10056987") set prtCplNorm2 = $LB("10062148", "10073902") set prtCplNorm3 = $LB("10055891", "10051730") set prtCplNorm4 = $LB("10072330", "10070539") set prtCplNorm5SeniorII = $LB("10090056","10090007") set prtCplMixed1 = $LB("10056986", "10073902") set prtCplMixed2 = $LB("10062148", "10056987") set prtSingle1 = "10053855" set prtSingle2 = "10053856"
set testData = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
w !,!, "=== 1. Competition not found" set testData.competitionId = 100 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 2. Recorder no privileges" set testData.competitionId = cmpNoPriv1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 3. Competition bad status" set testData.competitionId = cmpClosed1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 4. Deregistration normal couple(1) into normal cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 5. Deregistration normal couple(2) into normal cmp(2)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm2 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm2, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm2, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 6. Again deregistration normal couple(1) into normal cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 7. Deregistration couple with 2 epmty numbers into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 8. Deregistration couple with 1 epmty numbers into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = prtSingle1 set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 9. Deregistration mixed couple(1) into normal cmp(3)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNorm3 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplMixed1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplMixed1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 10. Deregistration normal solo(1)-man into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = prtSingle1 set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 11. Deregistration solo with empty number into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 12. Deregistration solo with wrong number into solo cmp(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpSingle1 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = "7777777" w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 13. Deregistration normal couple(1) into normal cmpSameDate(1)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate1 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 14. Deregistration normal couple(1) into normal cmpSameDate(2)" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate2 set testData.manNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 1) set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm1, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !,!, "=== 15. Deregistration normal solo into normal cmpSameDate(3). WRONG Age Group" set testData.competitionId = cmpNormSameDate3 set testData.manNumber = "" set testData.womanNumber = $LIST(prtCplNorm5SeniorII, 2) w !, ##class(WC.Web.JsonAdmin).Deregistration(testData)
w !, "== End of test registration" w !, "==================================================" } catch(ex){ w ! do $SYSTEM.OBJ.DisplayError(ex.AsStatus()) }
q $$$OK

Method.name: TestCoupleImportFromWDSF
TestCompetitonsImportFromWDSF
TestCompetitonsImportFromAllCmp
Method.Implementation:
if kill{ do ##class(WC.Data.Competition).%KillExtent() do ##class(WC.Data.Tournament).%KillExtent() }
&sql(DECLARE CurCmp CURSOR FOR SELECT ID FROM WC_Data.AllCmp)
&sql(OPEN CurCmp) for { &sql(FETCH CurCmp INTO :id) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set cmp = ##class(WC.Data.AllCmp).idIdxOpen(id) do ##class(WC.Data.Competition).Sync(cmp, .st)
if $$$ISERR(st){ w !, "id="_id w !,$system.OBJ.DisplayError(st) return st } }
&sql(CLOSE CurCmp)
quit $$$OK

Method.name: TestRecorder
Method.Implementation:
set st = $$$OK
try{ TSTART
set data = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set data.login = "ilson" set data.name = "Super admin" set data.otherInfo = "Just ilya" #dim rec As WC.Data.Recorder = ##class(WC.Data.Recorder).Save(data, .st) $$$THROWONERROR(st, st)
set trnId = "" &sql(SELECT ID INTO :trnId FROM WC_Data.Tournament) do rec.AvailableTournaments.SetAt(##class(WC.Data.Tournament).%OpenId(trnId), trnId) do rec.%Save()
TCOMMIT } catch(ex){ TROLLBACK set st = ex.AsStatus() w !,$system.OBJ.DisplayError(st) }
quit st
